content.raw: Yeah, makes sense.  By the way, you were right about the links needing inertia; that's exactly the problem.  I have a pending patch that will introduce the above fix, and also fix the test so it works.  I'll open a PR for that (along with fixes for some additional tests) once my current batch of PRs gets worked through.
content.html: Yeah, makes sense. By the way, you were right about the links needing inertia; that's exactly the problem. I have a pending patch that will introduce the above fix, and also fix the test so it works. I'll open a PR for that (along with fixes for some additional tests) once my current batch of PRs gets worked through.
